casebody.data:
SAEGESSER ENGINEERING, INC., Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
Terry AMICK, Appellee-Defendant. Court of Appeals Case No. 72A01-1711-PL-2660 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed August 1, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BARNES , Sr.J. Affirmed. VAIDIK, C.J., Concurs.

PYLE, J., Concurs.
